actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for assistance to certain owners of property damaged by flood waters at the Galveston Bay project at Baytown, Texas.

summary.text: Specifies the eligibility requirements and the formula for computing benefits for persons receiving assistance for flood damage at Baytown, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to provide for assistance to certain owners of property damaged by flood waters at the Galveston Bay project at Baytown, Texas.
